hadiths.text: Abdullah reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:If you are three, two amongst you should not converse secretly between yourselves to the exclusion of the other (third one), unti some other people join him (and dispel his loneliness), for it may hurt his feelings

chapter.ara-name: باب تَحْرِيمِ مُنَاجَاةِ الاِثْنَيْنِ دُونَ الثَّالِثِ بِغَيْرِ رِضَاهُ
chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition Of Two People Conversing Privately To The Exclusion Of A Third Without His Consent
